title: Login Issues with Mobile App
description: Customer unable to login to mobile application. Getting 'Invalid credentials' error despite using correct username and password.

title: Payment Processing Error
description: Transaction failed during checkout process. Customer charged but order not confirmed. Payment gateway returned error code 4001.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Customer requesting dark mode theme for better accessibility and reduced eye strain during nighttime usage.

title: Email Notifications Not Working
description: Customer reports not receiving order confirmation emails. Email address verified and appears correct in system.

title: Profile Picture Upload Fails
description: Unable to upload profile picture. System shows 'File too large' error even for images under 2MB. Tried multiple formats (JPG, PNG).

title: Data Sync Issues Between Devices
description: User data not syncing properly between desktop and mobile versions. Changes made on one device not reflecting on the other.

title: Billing Discrepancy Question
description: Customer questioning charges on monthly invoice. Appears to be charged for premium features not subscribed to.

title: Account Deletion Request
description: Customer wants to permanently delete account and all associated data. Requesting confirmation of GDPR compliance process.

title: API Rate Limit Exceeded
description: Developer customer hitting API rate limits unexpectedly. Requests per minute seem within documented limits but getting 429 errors.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Password reset emails not being delivered. Customer checked spam folder and tried multiple email addresses.

title: Search Function Returns No Results
description: Search functionality appears broken. No results returned for any search terms, including items that definitely exist in the system.

title: Export Data Feature Not Responding
description: Data export button unresponsive when clicked. Customer needs to export transaction history for tax purposes. No error message displayed.
